author: mapellidario
body:
### status

tests:

### description

We would like to 

- build crabserver specfile in py3 by default
- build crabserver using official dmwm/WMCore tags, without our debug changes (https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/compare/master...mapellidario:crabserver-rest-py3)

fyi: @belforte
title: crabserver - specfile points to py3 by default, switch back to dmwm/WMcore
